SELECT company_id as companyId, company_sido as companySido, company_sigungu as companySigungu, company_bname as companyBname, company_name as companyName, company_ceo_name as companyCeoName, company_email as companyEmail, company_unique_no as companyUniqueNo, company_phone as companyPhone, company_date as companyDate FROM mini_market_company WHERE company_id = #{companyId}

SELECT company_id as companyId, company_email as companyEmail, company_date as company_date FROM mini_market_company WHERE company_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') ORDER BY company_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT member_id as memberId, member_sido as memberSido, member_sigungu as memberSigungu, member_bname as memberBname, member_nickname as memberNickname, member_email as memberEmail, member_unique_no as memberUniqueNo, member_phone as memberPhone, member_date as memberDate FROM mini_market_member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
